name: enumerate_all_accounts
description: Lists all users in the system.

name: fetch_account_information
description: Retrieves information about a specific user.

target_profile_id.description: The unique identifier of the user to retrieve. Cannot be empty.

name: fetch_replies_for_media_item
description: Lists all comments on a specific media post.

source_post_id.description: The ID of the media post to retrieve comments for.

name: find_profile_id_by_handle
description: Searches for a user by their username and returns the corresponding user ID.

search_handle.description:
The username to look up in the system.
This field cannot be an empty string or contain only whitespace.

name: leave_reply_on_post
description: Adds a comment to a media post.

parent_item_id.description: The ID of the media post being commented on.

commenter_account_id.description: The ID of the user making the comment.

name: publish_new_gallery_item
description: Creates a new media post associated with a user.

author_account_id.description: The ID of the user who owns the media. Must be a non-empty string.

content_location_url.description: URL of the media image. Must be a non-empty string.

post_description.description:
Caption or description for the media. Must be a string.
Defaults to "".

name: purge_user_profile
description: Deletes a specified user from the system.

profile_id_for_removal.description: The unique identifier of the user to delete.

name: register_new_profile
description: Creates a new user with a given ID, name, and username.

new_profile_id.description: The unique identifier for the user.

name: remove_gallery_post
description: Deletes a specified media post from the system.

post_identifier_to_delete.description:
The unique identifier of the media post to delete.
Must be a non-empty string.

name: retrieve_entire_media_feed
description: Lists all media posts in the system.
